thread.title: Patti Wetherington Goodson
thread.title_full: Time4Learning reviewed by Patti Wetherington Goodson

author: Patti Wetherington Goodson
title: Patti Wetherington Goodson
text: Great, only problem- learning disabled children get a little bored with the extremely long intros to subjects. They LOVE Jack Riley on WORD HERD Also, the history or social studies.The science is too drawn out and boring for their ADHD attention spans. The math confuses them on every level. I would still opt for this program and add our own ,as we have been doing for many years.I studied them all and this one fit the best for our family of 3 home schoolers. Started when they were all early elementary and now all 15,16, 18.
